cofh.api.item

Interface IToolHammer


  • public interface IToolHammer
    Implement this interface on subclasses of Item to have that item work as a tool for CoFH mods.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isUsable(ItemStack item, EntityLivingBase user, int x, int y, int z)
      Called to ensure that the wrench can be used.
      void toolUsed(ItemStack item, EntityLivingBase user, int x, int y, int z)
      Callback for when the tool has been used reactively.

    • Method Detail

      • isUsable

        boolean isUsable(ItemStack item,
               EntityLivingBase user,
               int x,
               int y,
               int z)
        Called to ensure that the wrench can be used.
        Parameters:
        item - The itemstack for the tool. Not required to match equipped item (e.g., multi-tools that contain other tools)
        user - The entity using the tool
        x - X location of the block/tile
        y - Y location of the block/tile
        z - Z location of the block/tile
        Returns:
        True if this tool can be used

      • toolUsed

        void toolUsed(ItemStack item,
            EntityLivingBase user,
            int x,
            int y,
            int z)
        Callback for when the tool has been used reactively.
        Parameters:
        item - The ItemStack for the tool. Not required to match equipped item (e.g., multi-tools that contain other tools)
        user - The entity using the tool
        x - X location of the block/tile
        y - Y location of the block/tile
        z - Z location of the block/tile
